name: Google Workspace Admin Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Workspace Admin Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Google Workspace Admin API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Google Workspace Admin API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: user
available_options: ChromeOS Device (值: device)
Group (值: group)
User (值: user)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Add to Group (值: addToGroup) - Add an existing user to a group
Create (值: create) - Create a user
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a user
Get (值: get) - Get a user
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many users
Remove From Group (值: removeFromGroup) - Remove a user from a group
Update (值: update) - Update a user
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

deviceId.name: deviceId
deviceId.description: Select the device you want to retrieve
deviceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Device | 作用: Select the device you want to retrieve | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

projection.name: projection
projection.description: What subset of fields to fetch for this user
projection.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Fields | 作用: What subset of fields to fetch for this user | 默认值: basic | (必填项)
available_options: Don't Include (值: basic) - Do not include any custom fields for the user
Custom (值: custom) - Include custom fields from schemas requested in Custom Schema Names or IDs
Include All (值: full) - Include all fields associated with this user

includeChildOrgunits.name: includeChildOrgunits
includeChildOrgunits.description: Whether to include devices from organizational units below your specified organizational unit
includeChildOrgunits.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Children | 作用: Whether to include devices from organizational units below your specified organizational unit | 默认值: False

filter.name: filter
filter.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 默认值: {}
available_options: customer (值: None) - The unique ID for the customer's Google Workspace account
domain (值: None) - The domain name. Use this field to get groups from a specific domain.
query (值: None) - Query string to filter the results. Follow Google Admin SDK documentation. More info.
showDeleted (值: None) - Whether retrieve the list of deleted users

sort.name: sort
sort.description: Define sorting rules for the results
sort.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sort | 作用: Define sorting rules for the results | 默认值: {}
available_options: sortRules (值: None)

updateOptions.name: updateOptions
updateOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: orgUnitPath (值: None) - The full path to the organizational unit. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
annotatedUser (值: None) - The annotated user of the device
annotatedLocation (值: None) - The annotated location of the device
annotatedAssetId (值: None) - The annotated asset ID of a device
notes (值: None) - Add notes to a device

action.name: action
action.description: Set the status of a device
action.natural_language_description: 参数名: Status | 作用: Set the status of a device | 默认值: reenable | (必填项)
available_options: Enabled (值: reenable) - Re-enable a disabled chromebook
Disabled (值: disable) - Disable a chromebook

groupId.name: groupId
groupId.description: Select the group to perform the operation on
groupId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group | 作用: Select the group to perform the operation on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group Name | 作用: The group's display name

email.name: email
email.description: The group's email address. If your account has multiple domains, select the appropriate domain for the email address. The email must be unique
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Group Email | 作用: The group's email address. If your account has multiple domains, select the appropriate domain for the email address. The email must be unique | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: changePasswordAtNextLogin (值: None) - Whether the user is forced to change their password at next login
phoneUi (值: None)
emailUi (值: None)
roles (值: None) - Select the roles you want to assign to the user
customFields (值: None) - Allows editing and adding of custom fields

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: archived (值: None) - Whether user is archived
suspendUi (值: None) - Whether to set the user as suspended. If set to OFF, the user will be reactivated. If not added, the status will remain unchanged.
changePasswordAtNextLogin (值: None) - Whether the user is forced to change their password at next login
firstName (值: None)
lastName (值: None)
password (值: None) - Stores the password for the user account. A minimum of 8 characters is required. The maximum length is 100 characters.
phoneUi (值: None)
primaryEmail (值: None) - The user's primary email address. This property is required in a request to create a user account. The primaryEmail must be unique and cannot be an alias of another user.
emailUi (值: None)
roles (值: None) - Select the roles you want to assign to the user
customFields (值: None) - Allows editing and adding of custom fields

userId.name: userId
userId.description: Select the user to perform the operation on
userId.natural_language_description: 参数名: User | 作用: Select the user to perform the operation on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | (必填项)

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | (必填项)

password.name: password
password.description: Stores the password for the user account. A minimum of 8 characters is required. The maximum length is 100 characters.
password.natural_language_description: 参数名: Password | 作用: Stores the password for the user account. A minimum of 8 characters is required. The maximum length is 100 characters. | (必填项)

username.name: username
username.description: The username that will be set to the user. Example: If you domain is example.com and you set the username to n.smith then the user's final email address will be n.smith@example.com.
username.natural_language_description: 参数名: Username | 作用: The username that will be set to the user. Example: If you domain is example.com and you set the username to n.smith then the user's final email address will be n.smith@example.com.

domain.name: domain
domain.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

output.name: output
output.natural_language_description: 参数名: Output | 默认值: simplified | (必填项)
available_options: Simplified (值: simplified) - Only return specific fields: kind, ID, primaryEmail, name (with subfields), isAdmin, lastLoginTime, creationTime, and suspended
Raw (值: raw) - Return all fields from the API response
Select Included Fields (值: select) - Choose specific fields to include

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Fields to include in the response when "Select Included Fields" is chosen
fields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields | 作用: Fields to include in the response when "Select Included Fields" is chosen | 默认值: []
available_options: Creation Time (值: creationTime)
Is Admin (值: isAdmin)
Kind (值: kind)
Last Login Time (值: lastLoginTime)
Name (值: name)
Primary Email (值: primaryEmail)
Suspended (值: suspended)

customFieldMask.name: customFieldMask
customFieldMask.description: A comma-separated list of schema names. All fields from these schemas are fetched. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
customFieldMask.natural_language_description: 参数名: Custom Schema Names or IDs | 作用: A comma-separated list of schema names. All fields from these schemas are fetched. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
